speech: Narrow Brown Leaf Spot chawal ke patton par honay wali ek fungal bimari hai jo Helminthosporium oryzae ki wajah se hoti hai.
Symptoms mein patton par chhoti, patli aur brown ya reddish streaks shamil hain jo gradually zyada ho jati hain.
Severe infections mein plant ki photosynthesis kam ho jati hai aur yield significant taur par gir jata hai.
Yeh bimari zyadatar high humidity aur warm temperatures mein hoti hai.
Control ke liye resistant chawal ki varieties ugane ki salah di jati hai aur fungicides ka sahi istemal karein.
Crop rotation aur field sanitation ka khayal rakhein taake fungus ka spread roka ja sake.
